text: Paul Reiser (born March 30, 1957) is an American comedian, actor, model, composer, television personality and writer, author and musician. He is best known for his role in the 1990s TV sitcom Mad About You. He is ranked 77th on Comedy Central's 2004 list of the "100 Greatest Stand-ups of All Time". His well known movie roles are in Diner (1982), Beverly Hills Cop (1984), a role he reprised in its sequel, Beverly Hills Cop II (1987). Reiser also had roles in James Cameron's Aliens (1986), in which he played the corrupt Carter Burke; The Marrying Man (1991) and Bye Bye Love (1995). Reiser is Jewish. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American writers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from New York City Category:American composers Category:American television writers Category:Writers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Paul Reiser
